en: Not unto us, O Jehovah, not unto us, But unto thy name give glory, For thy lovingkindness, and for thy truth’s sake.
hmr: Aw LALPA, keini mi pe loin, keini mi pe loin, I hming chu ropuina pe lem rawh, I ngilneina le i thutak leiin.

en: Wherefore should the nations say, Where is now their God?
hmr: Iengdinga hnam tinin, “Khâwlai am an Pathien kha teh?” an ti am a na?

en: But our God is in the heavens: He hath done whatsoever he pleased.
hmr: Kan Pathien chu vânah a um sih a, A nuom taphawt a thaw a nih.

en: Their idols are silver and gold, The work of men’s hands.
hmr: An milimhai chu tangka le rângkachak an na, Mihriem kutsuok an nih.

en: They have mouths, but they speak not; Eyes have they, but they see not;
hmr: Bauhai an nei a, an ṭawng thei si nawh, Mithai an nei a, an hmu thei si nawh.

en: They have ears, but they hear not; Noses have they, but they smell not;
hmr: Nahai an nei a, an hriet thei si nawh, Hnârhai an nei a, rim an hriet thei si nawh.

en: They have hands, but they handle not; Feet have they, but they walk not; Neither speak they through their throat.
hmr: Kuthai an nei a, iengkhawm an tâwk thei si nawh. Kehai an nei a, an lâwn thei si nawh a, An hnukin an ṭawng thei si nawh.

en: They that make them shall be like unto them; Yea, every one that trusteth in them.
hmr: Chuong siemtuhai chu chuong ang bawk chun um an ta, Anih, chuong ringtu taphawthai chu.

en: O Israel, trust thou in Jehovah: He is their help and their shield.
hmr: Aw Israelhai, LALPA chu ring ro, Ama chu anni ṭhangpuitu le an phaw a nih.

en: O house of Aaron, trust ye in Jehovah: He is their help and their shield.
hmr: Aw Aron sûnghai, LALPA chu ring ro, Ama chu anni ṭhangpuitu le an phaw a nih.

en: Ye that fear Jehovah, trust in Jehovah: He is their help and their shield.
hmr: LALPA ṭituhai, LALPA chu ring ro, Ama chu anni ṭhangpuitu le an phaw a nih.

en: Jehovah hath been mindful of us; he will bless us: He will bless the house of Israel; He will bless the house of Aaron.
hmr: LALPA chun a mi hriet zing a, mal mi sâwm a tih, Israel sûnghai chu mal sâwm a ta, Aron sûnghai chu mal sâwm a tih.

en: He will bless them that fear Jehovah, Both small and great.
hmr: LALPA ṭituhai chu mal sâwm a ta, A lien a chînin.

en: Jehovah increase you more and more, You and your children.
hmr: LALPA chun sukpung deu deu raw se cheu, Nangni le in nauhai leh.

en: Blessed are ye of Jehovah, Who made heaven and earth.
hmr: LALPA chun mal sâwm raw se cheu, Ama chu hnuoi le vân siemtu a nih.

en: The heavens are the heavens of Jehovah; But the earth hath he given to the children of men.
hmr: Vânhai khi LALPA vânhai a na, Leihnuoi ruok hi chu mihriem nauhai kuomah a pêk a nih.

en: The dead praise not Jehovah, Neither any that go down into silence;
hmr: Mithihai chun LALPA chu an inpâk nawh a, Hmun retaka zu fehai hrim hrim chun an inpâk bawk nawh.

en: But we will bless Jehovah From this time forth and for evermore. Praise ye Jehovah.
hmr: Eini ruok chun LALPA chu inpâk tâng ei tih, Tuta inthawka kumkhaw- tluongin. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
